duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare customer proposals and validate incoming RFQ’s from salespeople & agents.
Negotiate terms and conditions on deals and manage customer trials.
Travel as necessary to support technical meetings, trade shows, and training.
Maintain market knowledge and share information with the global organization.
Generate sales forecasts, understand competitive landscape, and maintain relationships with existing customers.
Proactively identify market trends and new opportunities and train and support the current sales team.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 2 years in the capital equipment space required, previous sales experience is a strong plus.
